comments.body: Define the `dtype_range` for computing the `scale` of dtype, according to [scikit-image dtype range](https://github.com/scikit-image/scikit-image/blob/master/skimage/util/dtype.py#L8)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +290,294 @@
# Define data type range of numpy dtype
dtype_range = {np.bool_: (False, True),
               np.bool8: (False, True),
               np.uint8: (0, 255),
